definition: wooden or stone block supporting the axle of a door

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
block/gate pillar/pier/classifier for clusters of plants/classifier for rounds in a card game: trick/(archaic) watchtower

sentences.english: The gate piles in front of his house are carved lions.
sentences.chinese: 他家門前的門墩被雕刻成一對獅子。

sentences.english: Do the crickets in the door mounds still sing their song?
sentences.chinese: 聽聽門墩下的蟋蟀是否還唱？
